summary: Refactored the authentication and authorization microservices to help bring in oAuth2 protocol and third party integrations. Primarily worked on Javascript API microservices using Nodejs. Built a complete end to end testing suite in order to quickly find the service causing issues in the archietcture.

Managed compliance testing projects for Zigbee Home Automation, Zigbee Smart Energy, and Qi Wireless devices. Used Java programming to automate several Zigbee specification tests for both Home Automation and Smart Energy profiles.
Helped maintain and customize 3D printers used to prototype aerospace parts
